<doc> WEBFILTER -- Configure the Hop proxy

== Description ==

[[webfilter|WEBFILTER]] lets users enabling or disabling the configuration
of the Hop proxy. This weblet is only relevant if users happen to use Hop
both as a //broker// and a regular //web proxy//. 

The Hop proxy filtering allows:

  * filtering out some domains and URLs (for instance, the ones containing
 commercials).
  * re-writing HTTP headers.
  * re-writing received pages.

</doc>
